author: Beth Andrews
title: project 1 eval
answer1: Working with you has been very smooth and efficient. I like your personality and attitude towards your work. Sometimes the replies to my emails would come a bit slow but otherwise an amazing experience!
answer3: As I mentioned, I've been pretty happy with your work ethic and I think your creativity is top notch! Communication could be done efficiently but otherwise thank you for your hard work!
